title: Strengthening Software Development Competencies: CoI-Based Collaboration for Enhancing Online Teachers' Digital Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners design collaborative discussions in online learning communities by applying the Community of Inquiry (CoI) framework.
Learners can operate a professionalism-based feedback system with peer teachers using digital tools
Learners can analyze educational field problems and propose improvement plans through reflective practice techniques

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
